channel.title: Npc maxhit

item.title: Npc maxhit
item.dc:creator: @Darkmagic42 Darkmagic42
item.description:
@Darkmagic42 wrote:

hey, i am rying to change the maxhit of 4 custom npcs that i added i have added these codes into npchandler.java yet they still only hit 1s and 2s. plz help?

here are the codes i have entered and not worked

                                                            }
	                                       if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2995) {
				gfxAll(369, EnemyY, EnemyX);
				hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(27);

}
if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2995) { //spirit kalphite
hitDiff = misc.random(27);

}
if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2995) {
gfxAll(369, EnemyY, EnemyX);
hitDiff = 2 + misc.random(27);
